posts.title: Getting Started with Next.js
posts.content: Next.js is a powerful React framework that makes building full-stack web applications simple and efficient. It provides features like server-side rendering, static site generation, and API routes out of the box.
posts.author: John Doe
posts.excerpt: Learn the basics of Next.js and how to get started with this powerful React framework.

posts.title: Understanding TypeScript
posts.content: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, making it easier to write and maintain large applications. It provides features like interfaces, generics, and type inference that help catch errors before runtime.
posts.author: Jane Smith
posts.excerpt: Dive into TypeScript and learn how it can improve your JavaScript development experience.
